name: transplantation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of moving something from one place to another: Plants must be strong enough to survive transplantation.
medical
  specialized taking body tissues from one body and placing them in another body or in another part of the same body: bone marrow transplantation organ transplantation Primary liver cancer can only be cured with resection or liver transplantation. Transplantation of organs from living donors raises ethical issues.
